content.raw:
I ran into the same error, but I believe I found the issue (or at least a workaround): You simply need to run in your terminal

$ source ~/subt_ws/install/setup.bash

Or whatever location your subt_ws setup.bash file is. In the original installation tutorial it suggested this is added to your bash. I'm guessing you didn't.  I don't know if this example is supposed to depend on the other subt workspace bash file or not, that's above my limited knowledge of ROS, but it fixed it for me.
